mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, name, model_file_path, accuracy, in_param_size, out_param_size, type, structure from sys_algorithm where id = #{id}

select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, name, model_file_path, accuracy, in_param_size, out_param_size, type, structure from sys_algorithm where id in
#{item}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_algorithm( id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, name, model_file_path, accuracy, in_param_size, out_param_size, type, structure) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{name}, #{modelFilePath}, #{accuracy}, #{inParamSize}, #{outParamSize}, #{type}, #{structure})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_algorithm where 1=1
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
